system.description:
Having heard the songs and sagas of the wild, you have reached a point where you wish to add your own chapters and verses to them. You gain the following benefits:

  • If a spell appears on both the bard and druid spell lists (including any modifications to either list from your bard and/or druid archetypes) you gain access to it when you gain a spell slot of the appropriate level and may cast it as a druid spell.

  • You learn the Song of Rest Adventuring Trick if you do not already know it. If you do, select another Adventuring Trick you qualify for in its place.

  • The ranges of your Bardic Inspiration and Battle Hymn abilities are doubled while you are in natural surroundings.
